## ğŸ¯ Best Practices

- Use direct links in all bios/profiles
- Reuse similar value points: privacy, CAD, unlimited, free/pro
- Use consistent hashtags: #KryptoTrac #CryptoCanada #Fintech #CryptoTracker
- Schedule posts across time zones for maximum reach
- Engage with comments within first hour for algorithm boost
